item.title: 3D Discontinuous Galerkin - Meniscus regeneration macroscopic model simulation
item.description:
Biomedical problem: Meniscus regeneration, multiscale modeling of tissue phenomena.

 Implement PDEs in FreeFem++ representing a nonwoven scaffold in a novel 3D printed perfusion chamber which is integrated in a bioreactor that allows in-vitro investigations of scaffolds in interaction with chondrocytes and adipose tissue-derived stem cells

 Stimulus via a pump system (fluid-solid interaction)

     Sensitivity analysis of the parameters with model order reduction techniques (compared to real data)

item.title: Back and Forth Nudging - Wave equation
item.description: Initial conditions reconstruction with BFN on a bounded domain [0,1] with Dirichlet bnd conditions, FEM P1 and Newmark scheme for time. Video in 1D with an observation of the measurements between [0,0.2] and [0.8,1].

item.title: Finite Elements Method implementation
item.description: Implement the Finite Elements method in C++ to solve 2D Navier-Stokes equation in a channel

item.title: Non intrusive reduced basis module.
item.description: Contribute to an online library with EDF and other partners on non intrusive reduced basis method in Python and C++.
